author: aconway
msg: NO-JIRA: Use DEFAULT_TIMEOUT consistently. Handly for running valgrind tests.
Running tests under valgrind generally causes a timeout because valgrind is
slow.  Some tests were not using the DEFAULT_TIMEOUT. Now all tests are using
that timeout so setting the environment variable QPID_SYSTEM_TEST_TIMEOUT=30 say
will allow tests to run with valgrind.

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-3599 - OakRepositoryIT.testOsgiResourceEvents now works with Oak 1.0.7

author: kwright
msg: Create a branch to deal with Java problems on CONNECTORS-1077 web connector refactoring

author: markt
msg: Allow the same class to be added to an instance of javax.el.ImportHandler more than once without triggering an error. The second and subsequent calls for the same class will be ignored.
